entity.name: Trump's advice to Boeing reminds some of his defunct businesses
entity.description: President Trump weighed in on Boeing in the wake of its two deadly crashes in recent months, advising them to "FIX" and "REBRAND." POTUS' statement reminded some of his own stint with aviation, along with several other ventures, that are now defunct.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Before opening economy again.This small step will make people more confident if we have simple transparent faceshield mask  available to everyone to prot from Covid19. We are number one country in the world .Yet we were not able to make a simple mask with Tesla/NASA/Boeing.
